org.jerkar.api.depmanagement
Class JkPublishRepos

java.lang.Object
  org.jerkar.api.depmanagement.JkPublishRepos
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Iterable<JkPublishRepo>
public final class JkPublishRepos
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable<JkPublishRepo>, java.io.Serializable

Set of repositories to publish to. When publishing you may want deploy your artifact on to a repository or another according some criteria.
For example, you would like to publish snapshot on a repository and release to another one, so each repository registered in JkPublishRepos is associated with a filter that determine if it accepts or not the versionned module to publish.

See Also:
